name: SPAICE
description:
SPAICE August 16, 2078: Mission to protect a space cargo ship from attackers. Note: First AI-assisted space combat mission.

Destroy your enemies, collect resources and upgrade your space ship with the help of your robot builder in this arcade-style game created in 3 days for the wowie game jam (Yes, three days).

Note 1 : If you have problems with the online version of the game, try downloading it!

Note 2 : During the tutorial, when destroying 1 and after 3 enemies, don't kill them too quickly or the robot won't have time to count the killed enemies. The bug will be fixed after the gamejam.

Controls Q to call robot, E to activate shield, Left shift to teleport
Basic movements

Acceleration with [W], brake with [S]

Turn with the [MOUSE].

Roll with [A] and [D]
